metadata.title: CVE-2013-2222 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in GNU ZRTPCPP before 3.2.0 allowremote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly executearbitrary code via a crafted ZRTP Hello packet to the (1)ZRtp::findBestSASType, (2) ZRtp::findBestAuthLen, (3) ZRtp::findBestCipher,(4) ZRtp::findBestHash, or (5) ZRtp::findBestPubKey functions.

criterions.comment: libzrtpcpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
